metadata.description: What you need to get started with Haptrix

sections.title: Use an Apple Computer
sections.text: To use Haptrix, you need to use an Apple Computer

sections.title: Internet Connection
sections.text: To download Haptrix, you need an Internet connection

sections.title: Disk Space (10MB)
sections.text: The installed size of Haptrix is about 10MB, so you need to have at least that on your computer. Then if you want to save files, *.AHAP files are typically a few kilobytes each.

sections.title: Use macOS (minimum 10.15)
sections.text: We support macOS 10.15 as a minimum installable version, this will change over time as never version of macOS come out.

sections.title: iPhone (minimum iPhone 8)
sections.text: If you want to test your Haptics on an iPhone you will need an iPhone with a Taptic Engine, this can be found in iPhone 8 and greater.

sections.title: Game Controller
sections.text: If you're testing Haptics on a game controller, Haptrix supports PlayStation 5 Dual Sense, and Xbox Series X controllers
